alert.note: Alert for Washtenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 5:18PM EDT until August 03 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Washtenaw County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 518 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Manchester, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Saline and Dexter around 545 PM EDT. Ann Arbor around 550 PM EDT. Ypsilanti and Dixboro around 605 PM EDT. Salem around 615 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Pittsfield Township, Whittaker, Hudson Mills Metropark, Bridgewater, Delhi Mills, Pleasant Lake and Barton Hills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
